text: John William Getz (born October 15, 1946) is an American character actor. After beginning his acting career on stage, he has appeared in numerous television series and films. He was born in Davenport, Iowa, and grew up in the Mississippi River Valley. He was married to the playwright Grace McKeaney from 1987 until they divorced in 1996. They have daughter, Hannah. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Iowa Category:People from Davenport, Iowa
title: John Getz
